Game.Name: Captain Tsubasa - Eikou no Kiseki (Japan)
Game.plot: Captain Tsubasa: Eikou no Kiseki is a Sports game, developed and published by Konami,which was released in Japan in 2002.Cheat: Playing against less opponent playersOnce you are on a match, use ''Red Card'' (card number 443) on a event and then get a tie. Your opponent player will be thrown out, but sometimes he will also take some of his fellows with him, making you play against less opponent players.Cheat: Captain Tsubasa FC+In order to unlock this team (for fight in the Free Mode), finish the J-League Mode with every team.
